title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1808.1 - Conflict of interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1808.1 - Conflict of interest

State Regulations

No officer or employee of a municipality or of a

Municipal Urban Renewal Agency may engage in any act or activity which may be
construed as a conflict of interest within the scope of article 18 of the

General Municipal Law. In case of any question with respect thereto, inquiry
should be made to municipal or agency counsel for an opinion, and duplicate
originals of each such inquiry and opinion are to be submitted to the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1808.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
